20101222073605.000|20101222073606.000|CC1|I'M TERRY MORAN AND WE BEGIN    
20101222073606.000|20101222073607.000|CC1|TONIGHT WITH A CRIME.           
20101222073607.000|20101222073608.000|CC1|THE DIMENSIONS OF WHICH ARE     
20101222073608.000|20101222073612.000|CC1|STILL UNKNOWN.

20101222073613.000|20101222073614.000|CC1|FRANKLIN JUNIOR MURDERED AT     
20101222073614.000|20101222073615.000|CC1|LEAST TEN PEOPLE, ALL           
20101222073615.000|20101222073618.000|CC1|AFRICAN-AMERICAN WOMEN FROM     
20101222073618.000|20101222073621.000|CC1|SOUTH CENTRAL LOS ANGELES       
20101222073621.000|20101222073622.000|CC1|BEGINNING IN 1985.              
20101222073622.000|20101222073623.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES HAVE BEEN HARD PUT  
20101222073623.000|20101222073625.000|CC1|TO EXPLAIN HOWEVER A SEEMING GAP
20101222073625.000|20101222073627.000|CC1|IN FRANKLIN'S ALLEGED CRIMES    
20101222073627.000|20101222073630.000|CC1|BETWEEN THE YEARS 1988 AND 2002.
20101222073630.000|20101222073634.000|CC1|THIS APPARENT HIATUS EARNED     
20101222073634.000|20101222073636.000|CC1|FRANKLIN THE GRIM SLEEPER.      
20101222073636.000|20101222073639.000|CC1|BUT NOW NEW EVIDENCE HAS COME TO
20101222073639.000|20101222073640.000|CC1|LIGHT AND                       
20101222073640.000|20101222073640.000|CC1|DAVID WRIGHT REPORTS.           
20101222073640.000|20101222073641.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEIR FACES FROM   
20101222073641.000|20101222073642.000|CC1|THE PAST.                       
20101222073642.000|20101222073642.000|CC1|180 OF THEM.                    
20101222073642.000|20101222073644.000|CC1|SOME SMILING.                   
20101222073644.000|20101222073647.000|CC1|SOME SLEEPING.                  
20101222073647.000|20101222073648.000|CC1|SOME MAY EVEN BE DEAD.

20101222073649.000|20101222073652.000|CC1|SERIAL KILLER.

20101222073659.000|20101222073703.000|CC1|>> I HOPE NOT, BUT THEY -- THEY 
20101222073703.000|20101222073704.000|CC1|INTERACTED WITH LONNY FRANKLIN  
20101222073704.000|20101222073707.000|CC1|AT SOME POINT IN THEIR LIFE.    
20101222073707.000|20101222073708.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DETECTIVE DENNIS   
20101222073708.000|20101222073711.000|CC1|KILL COIN OF THE LAPD HOMICIDE  
20101222073711.000|20101222073712.000|CC1|UNIT SAYS ALL OF                
20101222073712.000|20101222073714.000|CC1|THESE IMAGES WERE TAKEN FROM THE
20101222073714.000|20101222073717.000|CC1|HOME OF LONNIE FRANKLIN JR., THE
20101222073717.000|20101222073719.000|CC1|MAN SUSPECTED TO BE             
20101222073719.000|20101222073719.000|CC1|THE GRIM SLEEPER SERIAL KILLER. 
20101222073719.000|20101222073720.000|CC1|>> WE SEARCHED EVERY NOOK AND   
20101222073720.000|20101222073723.000|CC1|CRANNY OF THIS RESIDENCE AND THE
20101222073723.000|20101222073724.000|CC1|BIG COMMERCIAL BUILDING THAT IT 
20101222073724.000|20101222073727.000|CC1|HAD IN THE BACKYARDS.           
20101222073727.000|20101222073729.000|CC1|VEHICLES, GLOVE BOXES,          
20101222073729.000|20101222073733.000|CC1|UNDERSEATS, EVERYWHERE.         
20101222073733.000|20101222073734.000|CC1|WE GATHERED CAMERAS, VIDEOS     
20101222073734.000|20101222073735.000|CC1|AND ALL TYPES OF STUFF FROM ALL 
20101222073735.000|20101222073737.000|CC1|OVER THE PROPERTY.

20101222073740.000|20101222073744.000|CC1|DECADES OF PHOTOGRAPHY BY THIS  
20101222073744.000|20101222073745.000|CC1|GUY BECAUSE HE IS OBVIOUSLY THE 
20101222073745.000|20101222073747.000|CC1|CAMERAMAN.                      
20101222073747.000|20101222073749.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND BECAUSE LONNIE 
20101222073749.000|20101222073752.000|CC1|FRANKLIN SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN THE 
20101222073752.000|20101222073753.000|CC1|CAMERAMAN, POLICE ARE TREATING

20101222073807.000|20101222073809.000|CC1|LAST YEAR.

20101222073813.000|20101222073816.000|CC1|GRIM SLEEPER BECAUSE HE WAS

20101222073828.000|20101222073829.000|CC1|MAY NOT HAVE BEEN QUIET FOR     
20101222073829.000|20101222073832.000|CC1|THOSE YEARS?

20101222073833.000|20101222073834.000|CC1|FOR A MINUTE HE WAS QUIET.

20101222073906.000|20101222073906.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 0:31:00

20101222073911.000|20101222073912.000|CC1|MURDERING AT LEAST TEN YOUNG

20101222073915.000|20101222073916.000|CC1|ANGELES SENDING FEAR AND TERROR 
20101222073916.000|20101222073916.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE STREETS OF SOUTH 
20101222073916.000|20101222073919.000|CC1|L.A.                            
20101222073919.000|20101222073921.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AT THE NEWS        
20101222073921.000|20101222073922.000|CC1|CONFERENCE LAST WEEK THE MAYOR  
20101222073922.000|20101222073924.000|CC1|AND THE POLICE CHIEF BOTH SPOKE

20101222073935.000|20101222073936.000|CC1|LONNIE FRANKLIN'S RAIN OF TERROR
20101222073936.000|20101222073939.000|CC1|IN THE CITY OF LOS ANGELES WILL 
20101222073939.000|20101222073941.000|CC1|SPAN WELL OVER TWO              
20101222073941.000|20101222073941.000|CC1|DECADES.                        
20101222073941.000|20101222073942.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THERE ARE      
20101222073942.000|20101222073942.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT QUESTIONS HEADING   
20101222073942.000|20101222073944.000|CC1|INTO THE TRIAL.                 
20101222073944.000|20101222073947.000|CC1|IN PART BECAUSE THE DNA THAT LED
20101222073947.000|20101222073949.000|CC1|POLICE TO FRANKLIN'S DOORSTEP   
20101222073949.000|20101222073955.000|CC1|WASN'T HIS, IT WAS HIS SON'S.   
20101222073955.000|20101222073957.000|CC1|>> IT'S CALLED FAMILIAL DNA     
20101222073957.000|20101222073959.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT IS NOT THE DNA OF AT 
20101222073959.000|20101222074000.000|CC1|SUSPECT BUT OF A VERY CLOSE     
20101222074000.000|20101222074001.000|CC1|RELATIVE.                       
20101222074001.000|20101222074002.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AUTHORITIES IN THE 
20101222074002.000|20101222074004.000|CC1|COLD CASE UNIT PROCESS DNA FROM 
20101222074004.000|20101222074005.000|CC1|THE CRIME SCENES AND LOOKED FOR 
20101222074005.000|20101222074008.000|CC1|A MATCH IN THE STATE'S DNA      
20101222074008.000|20101222074008.000|CC1|DATABASE.                       
20101222074009.000|20101222074009.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 0:31:00
20101222074008.000|20101222074009.000|CC1|IN CALIFORNIA ANYONE ARRESTED   
20101222074009.000|20101222074013.000|CC1|FOR A FELONY MUST GIVE A DNA    
20101222074013.000|20101222074013.000|CC1|SAMPLE                          
20101222074013.000|20101222074014.000|CC1|WHETHER OR NOT THEY'RE EVER     
20101222074014.000|20101222074015.000|CC1|CHARGED OR CONVICTED.           
20101222074015.000|20101222074017.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE THE MATCH CAME BACK
20101222074017.000|20101222074018.000|CC1|POSITIVE FOR A RELATIVE OF THE  
20101222074018.000|20101222074019.000|CC1|SUSPECT.                        
20101222074019.000|20101222074022.000|CC1|POLICE THEN NARROWED DOWN THE   
20101222074022.000|20101222074026.000|CC1|LIST OF POSSIBLE RELATIVES      
20101222074026.000|20101222074028.000|CC1|BEFORE ZEROING IN ON LONNIE     
20101222074028.000|20101222074029.000|CC1|FRANKLIN.                       
20101222074029.000|20101222074031.000|CC1|IT'S THE FIRST TIME FAMILIAL DNA
20101222074031.000|20101222074032.000|CC1|HAS EVER BEEN USED TO TRY AND   
20101222074032.000|20101222074034.000|CC1|SOLVE A MURDER CASE BUT THEY HAD
20101222074034.000|20101222074036.000|CC1|NO SAMPLE FROM FRANKLIN SO THEY 
20101222074036.000|20101222074039.000|CC1|STAKED HIM OUT UNTIL THEY GOT   
20101222074039.000|20101222074040.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20101222074040.000|20101222074043.000|CC1|>> A SLICE OF PIZZA, A FORK, A  
20101222074043.000|20101222074044.000|CC1|NAPKIN.                         
20101222074044.000|20101222074046.000|CC1|I THINK THERE WAS A TOTAL OF    
20101222074046.000|20101222074047.000|CC1|EIGHT DIFFERENT ITEMS THAT THEY 
20101222074047.000|20101222074047.000|CC1|SUBMITTED TO US.                
20101222074047.000|20101222074048.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THAT WAS       
20101222074048.000|20101222074048.000|CC1|ENOUGH?                         
20101222074048.000|20101222074049.000|CC1|>> IT TURNED OUT TO BE ENOUGH.  
20101222074049.000|20101222074050.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ENOUGH ALLEGEDLY TO
20101222074050.000|20101222074051.000|CC1|MATCH DNA FROM THE CRIME SCENES.
20101222074051.000|20101222074054.000|CC1|BUT WILL IT HOLD UP IN COURT?   
20101222074054.000|20101222074055.000|CC1|>> MR. SIMPSON, WOULD YOU SHOW  
20101222074055.000|20101222074057.000|CC1|YOUR HANDS TO THE JURY?         
20101222074057.000|20101222074102.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ANYONE WHO FOLLOWED
20101222074102.000|20101222074104.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE VERSUS O.J. SIMPSON  
20101222074104.000|20101222074106.000|CC1|CAN TELL YOU, EVEN WHEN THE DNA 
20101222074106.000|20101222074107.000|CC1|SEEMS LIKE A                    
20101222074107.000|20101222074107.000|CC1|SLAM DUNK, THAT DOESN'T

20101222074112.000|20101222074114.000|CC1|BECOME MORE COMFORTABLE WITH DNA
20101222074114.000|20101222074114.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 0:31:00
20101222074114.000|20101222074115.000|CC1|EVIDENCE.

20101222074117.000|20101222074118.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IF LONNIE FRANKLIN

20101222074120.000|20101222074121.000|CC1|NATIONWIDE EXPANSION OF FAMILIAL
20101222074121.000|20101222074121.000|CC1|DNA.                            
20101222074121.000|20101222074123.000|CC1|>> THIS WILL CHANGE THE WAY THAT
20101222074123.000|20101222074124.000|CC1|POLICING IS DONE IN THE UNITED  
20101222074124.000|20101222074126.000|CC1|STATES.                         
20101222074126.000|20101222074128.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND IF THE CASE    
20101222074128.000|20101222074130.000|CC1|SUDDENLY BECOMES MUCH BIGGER

20101222074133.000|20101222074136.000|CC1|LUST WILL BE MORE INTENSE THAN  
20101222074136.000|20101222074136.000|CC1|EVER.                           
20101222074136.000|20101222074140.000|CC1|AS SOON AS THE LAPD POSTED THESE
20101222074140.000|20101222074142.000|CC1|PHOTOS LAST WEEK, THE RESPONSE  
20101222074142.000|20101222074143.000|CC1|WAS HUGE.                       
20101222074143.000|20101222074143.000|CC1|>> A MILLION HITS.              
20101222074143.000|20101222074144.000|CC1|IT WAS PRETTY MIND-BOGGLING TO  
20101222074144.000|20101222074147.000|CC1|ME.                             
20101222074147.000|20101222074148.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE HAVE BEEN    
20101222074148.000|20101222074149.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF PHONE CALLS, TOO.   
20101222074149.000|20101222074151.000|CC1|EACH OF THEM PROVIDING A LEAD   
20101222074151.000|20101222074153.000|CC1|THAT NOW NEEDS TO FOLLOWED UP.  
20101222074153.000|20101222074155.000|CC1|EACH ONE A POTENTIAL CLUE INTO  
20101222074155.000|20101222074159.000|CC1|THE MIND OF A SERIAL KILLER.    
20101222074159.000|20101222074202.000|CC1|>> THESE GUYS, THEY DO STRANGE  
20101222074202.000|20101222074203.000|CC1|THINGS, AND, YOU KNOW,
